game.name: Ambidextro
game.desc: Ambidextro is a multiplayer for a single player. Learn to control two characters at the same time, one with each hand. Develop your ambidexterity and rescue both the prince and the princess simultaneously.

game.name: Ambidextro native
game.desc: Some devices require button mapping from the options menu.

game.name: Ambidextro lightweight
game.desc: Some devices require button mapping from the options menu.
